item.title: North Seattle Prepares for Light Rail
item.description: Earlier this month, residents of North Seattle gathered to share information, resources, and get connected at U District's Let's Go Transit Talk. The U District, Roosevelt, and Northgate Link light rail stations will arrive in 2021 which means these neighborhoods, as well as Licton Springs, will be better connected to …
item.dc:creator: amandacrosley

item.title: Vibrant Art Coming Soon to Aurora Ave N Pedestrian Bridge
item.description: The Aurora Ave N corridor is about to see some welcome color and vibrancy on its pedestrian bridge at N 102nd St. Crews will be focused on cleaning and painting the pedestrian bridge through the next three weeks. The pedestrian bridge will be open during cleaning and painting, although a …

item.title: Pumpkin Spice & Everything Nice: October Community Events
item.description:
Goblins, Witches, and Ghosts, OH MY! October is here! Check out some of the upcoming Licton Springs events this month.

Social & Networking Events:

Learn about the brewing industry and meet other local businesses!

item.title: Fall Into This Month's Community Events
item.description:

item.title: North Seattle Picnics in the Precincts is This Saturday!
item.description: Did you know the only Police Station in all of North Seattle is right here in Licton Springs? Now is your chance to meet them! This Saturday, August 18th from 1 pm to 4 pm at the Seattle Police Dept-North Precinct (10049 College Way N) the police department will be …

item.description:

item.description:
It's time to VOTE for your favorite park and street improvements!

Voting for the 2018 Your Voice, Your Choice: Parks and Streets is now live and a proposal for improvements at Licton Springs Park (project 18-5001) is listed as one of the options for District 5!

item.title: Licton Spring's P-Patch: Bringing Community Together
item.description:
It's officially spring time and with the warmer weather brings sunshine and blooming flowers. Did you know that Licton Springs has a community p-patch at College Way & North 92nd St?

What is a P-Patch?

P-Patch is the name given to community gardens that are managed by the Seattle P-Patch Community …
